p: The molecular network of the constituents from A. tenuifolius exhibited four major node spectral families ( Figure 2). The connections (edges) of nodes were represented by lines with thickness relative to cosine score, and the color green in nodes is relative to ion intensities from the AS-AT sample. We can observe a node cluster family of glycosylated flavonoids, but only four flavonoids were observed in AS-AT. In addition, a node cluster was observed from alkaloids.
